main.name: Juan M. Parra D.
main.bio: I am a Full Stack JavaScript Developer and a computer engineer highly enthusiastic about learning the best practices to improve as a professional, I really enjoy exploring new technologies, standards and methods that allow me to develop modern and powerful applications. passionate about challenges, I really like being able to understand the problems to provide an optimal solution, I am always willing to learn more, since curiosity is a quality that characterizes me because I always want to know in an integral, specific and general way about some software that wants to be developed.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me for a project request.

work.title: Freelancer
work.description: specialist on web developing ground and got a profound knowledge of doing anything related to this platform. Also, I have got an impressive urgency of learning and gaining new skills and knowledge with total ease.

testimonials.text: Juan Mario is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Juan Mario has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
